description: This file defines a reusable Angular button component with styling variants and event handling capabilities.

classes.name: ButtonComponent
classes.description: Angular component representing a styled button with configurable variants, disabled state, accessibility label, and click event emitter.

methods.name: variantClass
methods.description: Getter that returns the CSS class based on the selected variant.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Handles click events on the button, emitting the event through the 'clicked' event emitter.
